summary: A young man from the South Bronx dreams of making it as a rapper, until a run-in with local thugs forces him to hide in Puerto Rico with the father he never knew.
cast: Rosa Arredondo|Luis Cruz|Melonie Diaz|Charles Duckworth|Giancarlo Esposito|Carlos V. Flores|Alexis Isaac Garcia|John Garcia|Omarion|Zulay Henao|Norman Howell|Shydel James|Jerome Jones|Vico C.|Cesar A. Lugo|Joel F. Martinez|James McCaffrey|Pras Michel|Karl W. Morales|Raul 'Alexis' Ortiz|Meredith Ostrom|Rafael Pérez Veve|Julio Ramos|Victor Rasuk|Cisco Reyes|Jose Miguel Rocafort|Rodolfo Rodríguez|Kellita Smith|Carlos Vega|Malik Yoba|Americus Abesamis|Marc Anthony|Ramiro 'Ramir' Delgado Ruiz|Jennifer Lopez|Nicky Romaniello
title: Feel the Noise
